function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to the buildup of airborne contaminants","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission, discomfort, and reduced indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air ventilation, use appropriate filtration, and implement natural or forced ventilation techniques","Technologies":"HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters, natural ventilation through windows and doors, forced ventilation with ventilators or wind tunnels","People":"Building occupants, particularly those in crowded or poorly ventilated spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and HVAC system operators"},{"Description":"Misinformation leading to misunderstanding of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Failure to take appropriate precautions, increased risk of infection through close contact, and lack of trust in public health measures","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information about COVID-19 transmission, emphasize the importance of ventilation, and promote behavior change to reduce close contact","Technologies":"Public health communication channels, educational materials, and social media platforms","People":"General public, building occupants, and individuals making decisions about public health measures","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Improper ventilation maintenance leading to reduced effectiveness of ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to airborne contaminants, decreased indoor air quality, and potential equipment malfunction","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and inspection of ventilation systems, replacement of filters as needed, and monitoring of airflow rates","Technologies":"HVAC maintenance tools, air quality sensors, and filter replacement indicators","People":"HVAC system operators, maintenance personnel, and building owners","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and maintenance teams"}]}
